title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Personal Watercraft EA 2012
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Personal Watercraft EA 2012              Personal Watercraft Environmental Assessment 2012-2013       For more information and opportunities to submit comments online: http://parkplanning.nps.gov/piropwc  News release: February 13, 2013 PWC EA Public Scoping Comments Summary Report Available  News release: September 28, 2012 National Park Service Initiates New Planning Process Regarding Use of Personal Watercraft at Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore  News release: October 5, 2012 Public Meetings for Personal Watercraft Use at Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore  Newsletter: October 9, 2012 Scoping/Preliminary Draft Alternatives Brochure
